title: Delete an incident record
content:
Unlike other records, you can't delete individual incident records from the UI. However, you can set up scheduled jobs to automatically clean up records (including incidents) that have been in their final metaphase for a defined period of time. To do this, enable the purge or hard deletion features in Application Settings.

  • The purge application setting soft deletes records. This removes them from the frontend UI and REST API queries, but not from the database. For more information, see Enable purge.
  • The hard deletion application setting completely and permanently removes records from the system.Â For more information, see Enable hard deletion.
